item.title: Swift Evolution - Plan for module stability
item.description: In this post on the official Swift forum, Jordan Rose outlines the proposed solution for ABI stability, which is something we should get when Swift 5 arrives. This is something a lot of people in the community are looking forward to, and itâ€™s really interesting to see how it might be achieved.
